name: Winding Vines
description:
Entry for the Global Game Jam 2023 with the theme "Roots"!

Controls

Connect the command nodes of your vine and watch it grow!

Goal

Create blossoms on the tiles that are colored in purple.

Credits
  • Jakob Scharrer
  • Janik Helbig
  • Marian Becher
  • Patrick Deysenroth
